pages.text: Salt can be found in Barren Huts found in the Desert and can be used for many things.$(br2)You can place Salt on Ritual Braziers which is used for $(l:hexalia:rituals/ritual_of_transmutation)Ritual of Transmutation$().
You can combine Salt with Rotten Flesh to obtain Leather.
Salt can be mined from Salt Blocks in order to obtain Salt, a Fortune pickaxe allows you to mine it more efficiently.
A lamp can be crafted with Copper Ingot and Torch to illuminate dark areas.
